title: "‘Coded Bias’: Film features MIT researcher who found racial and gender bias in facial recognition programs"
excerpt: "Coded Bias” follows MIT Media Lab researcher Joy Buolamwini, who in 2018 co-authored an influential study showing that commercially available facial recognition programs had serious algorithmic bias against women and people of color."
